#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Sintax =

{{{
     // Imports_
     $java.lang
     
     // Defining a new variable
     x = 0
     
     // LOOP
     x < 10 & x >= 0 @
        System.out.println(x)
        x = x + 1
     @
     
     // IF
     x < 10 | x > 0 ?
         System.out.println("X is less than 10!")
     ? x > 10 & x = 10 ?
         System.out.println("X is greater than 10!")
     ??
         System.out.println("X = "+ x)
     ?
     
     // FUNCTION_
     // Allowed:_
     // addWithX v1, v2 # ... #
     // addWithX(v1 v2) # ... #
     addWithX(v1, v2) #
         \\ "~" is the return
         ~ x + v1 + v2
     #
     
     x = addWithX(1, 2)
     
     System.out.println("X = "+ x)
}}}

Null value:
{{{
     \\ $ is the null value
     x = $
}}}     

Arithmetic Operators:
{{{
     \\ + Addition
     x = 0 + 1
     x += 1
     
     \\ - Subtraction
     x = 0 - 1
     x -= 1
     
     \\ * Multiplication
     x = 0 * 1
     x *= 1
     
     \\ / Division
     x = 0 / 1
     x /= 1
     
     \\ % Modulus
     x = 0 % 1
     x %= 1
}}}

Comparison Operators:
{{{
     // = Equal to
     (x = y)
     
     // ! Not equal to
     (x ! y)
     
     // < Less Than
     (x < y)
     
     // > Greater Than
     (x > y)
     
     // < Less Than or Equal To
     (x <= y)
     
     // > Greater Than or Equal To
     (x >= y)
}}}

Imports or include file:
{{{
     // Import
     $java.lang
     
     // Include file
     $"script.cj"
}}}

Comments supported:
{{{
-- Comment...
// Comment...
\ Comment...
}}}
